MAIN_MESSAGE: There is power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart, affecting properties in Whithorn and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have carried out fault finding investigations to narrow down the fault location and we now expect your supply to be restored by 10.00pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:01pm on Tuesday, 24 November 2020
